Exercises 5.1, 5.4

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(arm)
library(tidyverse)


df <- foreign::read.dta("http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~gelman/arm/examples/nes/nes5200_processed_voters_realideo.dta") %>%
  filter(year == 1992)


df_clean <- df %>%
    select(presvote_2party,
         gender, 
         educ1,
         partyid3,
         ideo,
         race,
         income) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(presvote_2party = str_sub(presvote_2party, 1, 1),
         gender = as.numeric(str_sub(gender, 1, 1)) - 1,
         educ1 = as.double(str_sub(educ1, 1, 1)),
         partyid3 = as_factor(str_sub(partyid3, 1, 1)),
         income = as.double(str_sub(income, 1, 1)),
         ideo = as_factor(str_sub(ideo, 1, 1)),
         race = as_factor(str_sub(race, 1, 1))) %>%
  mutate(bush_vote = as.double(presvote_2party) - 1) %>%
  select(-presvote_2party)
  
```

## Question 1

### Part a

```{r 1_a}
mod <- glm(bush_vote ~ gender + educ1 + partyid3 + ideo + race + income, data =  df_clean,
    family = "binomial")

mod_2 <- glm(bush_vote ~ gender + educ1 + partyid3 + ideo + race + income:gender, data =  df_clean,
    family = "binomial")

mod_3 <- glm(bush_vote ~ gender + educ1 + partyid3 + ideo + race + educ1:gender, data =  df_clean,
    family = "binomial")


summary(mod)
summary(mod_2)
summary(mod_3)

```
